Package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App

Class LeaderboardDatabase

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App.LeaderboardDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class LeaderboardDatabase extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
This class represents a SQLite database for storing leaderboard data. Extends the SQLiteOpenHelper class to handle database operations.

    • saveValue

    • updateLastValue

      public void updateLastValue(String value, String column)
      This method updates the last value in the specified column of the database. If no rows exist in the database, the value is saved as a new entry.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to be updated or saved
      column - the column in which to update or save the value

    • getValue

      public String getValue(String columnName)
      This method retrieves the value from the specified column of the last row in the database.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the name of the column from which to retrieve the value
      Returns:
      the value from the specified column of the last row, or null if not found

    • getEntriesSortedByScore

      public List<LeaderboardEntry> getEntriesSortedByScore()
      This method retrieves a list of leaderboard entries sorted by score in descending order.
      Returns:
      a list of leaderboard entries sorted by score
